## Channel.timeout() method

Constructs new channel which closes automatically after given period.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static timeout(delay: number): Channel<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  delay | <code>number</code> | time in ms |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Channel<any>`
